name: Spirithost

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally SPD in all Battles by 10%.

skills.name: Reap
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Heals by 50% of the damage inflicted.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%

skills.name: Strengthen
skills.raw_description:
Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Dark Gift
skills.raw_description:
Removes all debuffs on all allies. Places a [Block Debuffs] buff on all allies for 1 turn.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1
